revised_title: Observations on the Locomotion and Nervous System of Echinodermata
tldr: This study examines the locomotor system and nervous system of echinodermata, specifically focusing on the structure and function of their polian vesicles, radial canals, and ambulacral vessels. The research also investigates the communication between the ambulacral and blood vessels, as well as the internal nervous system and its distribution throughout the organism.
